segments.source_content:
---
slug: using-expo-in-gatsby
title: Using Expo in Gatsby
description: Using Expo in Gatsby... or how to use cross-platform components in a MDX blog post
authors: [slorber]
twitterThreadUrl: "https://slo.im/thread"
image: ./images/hero.png
---
You probably heard of [React-Native-Web](https://github.com/necolas/react-native-web), allowing to render **React-Native views on the web**.

translations.fr: Vous avez probablement entendu parler de [React-Native-Web](https://github.com/necolas/react-native-web), qui permet d'afficher **des vues React-Native sur le web**.
translations.en: Vous avez probablement entendu parler de [React-Native-Web](https://github.com/necolas/react-native-web), qui permet de rendre **des vues React-Native sur le web**.
translations.zh-hans: 你可能听说过 [React-Native-Web](https://github.com/necolas/react-native-web)，它允许在网页上渲染 **React-Native 视图**。

segments.source_content: **So, what about using React-Native in a Gatsby website?**

translations.fr: **Alors, pourquoi ne pas utiliser React-Native dans un site Gatsby ?**
translations.en: **Alors, pourquoi ne pas utiliser React-Native dans un site Gatsby ?**
translations.zh-hans: **那么，在 Gatsby 网站中使用 React-Native 怎么样？**

segments.source_content: This post is a **proof-of-concept**: it contains **React-Native** and **Expo** interactive components, embedded directly into [this article](https://github.com/slorber/sebastienlorber.com/tree/master/content/posts/2020-05-11-using-expo-in-gatsby) (using [MDX](https://github.com/mdx-js/mdx)), of my [open-source](https://github.com/slorber/sebastienlorber.com) Gatsby site.

translations.fr: Cet article est une **preuve de concept** : il contient des composants interactifs **React-Native** et **Expo**, intégrés directement dans [cet article](https://github.com/slorber/sebastienlorber.com/tree/master/content/posts/2020-05-11-using-expo-in-gatsby) (en utilisant [MDX](https://github.com/mdx-js/mdx)) de mon site Gatsby [open-source](https://github.com/slorber/sebastienlorber.com).
translations.en: Cet article est une **preuve de concept** : il contient des composants interactifs **React-Native** et **Expo**, intégrés directement dans [cet article](https://github.com/slorber/sebastienlorber.com/tree/master/content/posts/2020-05-11-using-expo-in-gatsby) (en utilisant [MDX](https://github.com/mdx-js/mdx)), de mon site Gatsby [open-source](https://github.com/slorber/sebastienlorber.com).
translations.zh-hans: 这篇文章是一个**概念验证**：它包含 **React-Native** 和 **Expo** 的交互式组件，直接嵌入到[这篇文章](https://github.com/slorber/sebastienlorber.com/tree/master/content/posts/2020-05-11-using-expo-in-gatsby)中（使用 [MDX](https://github.com/mdx-js/mdx)），该文章来自我[开源](https://github.com/slorber/sebastienlorber.com)的 Gatsby 站点。
